verses.verse: And <WG1161> the emissarys <WG652> and <WG2532> brethren <WG80> that were <WG5607> <WG5752> in <WG2596> Judaea <WG2449> heard <WG191> <WG5656> that <WG3754> the goyim <WG1484> had <WG1209> also <WG2532> received <WG1209> <WG5662> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> Kefa <WG4074> was come up <WG305> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414>, they that were of <WG1537> the b'ritmilah <WG4061> contended <WG1252> <WG5710> with <WG4314> him <WG846>,

But <WG1161> Kefa <WG4074> rehearsed the matter from the beginning <WG756> <WG5671>, and expounded <WG1620> <WG5710> it by order <WG2517> unto them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

I <WG1473> was <WG2252> <WG5713> in <WG1722> the city <WG4172> of Yafo <WG2445> davvening <WG4336> <WG5740>: and <WG2532> in <WG1722> a trance <WG1611> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> a vision <WG3705>, A certain <WG5100> vessel <WG4632> descend <WG2597> <WG5723>, as it had been <WG5613> a great <WG3173> sheet <WG3607>, let down <WG2524> <WG5746> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> by four <WG5064> corners <WG746>; and <WG2532> it came <WG2064> <WG5627> even <WG891> to me <WG1700>:

Upon <WG1519> the which <WG3739> when I had fastened mine eyes <WG816> <WG5660>, I considered <WG2657> <WG5707>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> <WG5627> fourfooted beasts <WG5074> of the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> wild beasts <WG2342>, and <WG2532> creeping things <WG2062>, and <WG2532> fowls <WG4071> of the air <WG3772>.
And <WG1161> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> a voice <WG5456> saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto me <WG3427>, Arise <WG450> <WG5631>, Kefa <WG4074>; slay <WG2380> <WG5657> and <WG2532> eat <WG5315> <WG5628>.

But <WG1161> I said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Not so <WG3365>, YY <WG2962>: for <WG3754> nothing <WG3956> common <WG2839> or <WG2228> unclean <WG169> hath <WG1525> at any time <WG3763> entered <WG1525> <WG5627> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750>.

But <WG1161> the voice <WG5456> answered <WG611> <WG5662> me <WG3427> again <WG1537> <WG1208> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, What <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath cleansed <WG2511> <WG5656>, that call <WG2840> not <WG3361> thou <WG4771> common <WG2840> <WG5720>.
And <WG1161> this <WG5124> was done <WG1096> <WG5633> <WG1909> three times <WG5151>: and <WG2532> all <WG537> were drawn up <WG385> <WG5681> again <WG3825> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, immediately <WG1824> there were <WG2186> three <WG5140> men <WG435> already <WG1824> come <WG2186> <WG5627> unto <WG1909> the house <WG3614> where <WG1722> <WG3739> <WG3739> I was <WG2252> <WG5713>, sent <WG649> <WG5772> from <WG575> Caesarea <WG2542> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>.

And <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> bade <WG2036> <WG5627> me <WG3427> go with <WG4905> <WG5629> them <WG846>, nothing <WG3367> doubting <WG1252> <WG5734>. Moreover <WG1161> <WG2532> these <WG3778> six <WG1803> brethren <WG80> accompanied <WG4862> <WG2064> <WG5627> me <WG1698>, and <WG2532> we entered <WG1525> <WG5627> into <WG1519> the man's <WG435> house <WG3624>:

And <WG5037> he shewed <WG518> <WG5656> us <WG2254> how <WG4459> he had seen <WG1492> <WG5627> an angel <WG32> in <WG1722> his <WG846> house <WG3624>, which stood <WG2476> <WG5685> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5631> unto him <WG846>, Send <WG649> <WG5657> men <WG435> to <WG1519> Yafo <WG2445>, and <WG2532> call for <WG3343> <WG5663> SHim`on <WG4613>, whose surname is <WG1941> <WG5746> Kefa <WG4074>;

Who <WG3739> shall tell <WG2980> <WG5692> thee <WG4314> <WG4571> words <WG4487>, whereby <WG1722> <WG3739> thou <WG4771> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> thy <WG4675> house <WG3624> shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>.

And <WG1161> as <WG1722> I <WG3165> began <WG756> <WG5670> to speak <WG2980> <WG5721>, the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> fell <WG1968> <WG5627> on <WG1909> them <WG846>, as <WG5618> <WG2532> on <WG1909> us <WG2248> at <WG1722> the beginning <WG746>.

Then <WG1161> remembered I <WG3415> <WG5681> the word <WG4487> of the YY <WG2962>, how <WG5613> that he said <WG3004> <WG5707>, Yochanan <WG2491> indeed <WG3303> immersed <WG907> <WG5656> with water <WG5204>; but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> shall be immersed <WG907> <WG5701> with <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.

Forasmuch <WG1487> then <WG3767> as <WG5613> 'Elohim <WG2316> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> them <WG846> the like <WG2470> gift <WG1431> as <WG2532> he did unto us <WG2254>, who believed <WG4100> <WG5660> on <WG1909> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>; <WG1161> what <WG5101> was <WG2252> <WG5713> I <WG1473>, that I could <WG1415> withstand <WG2967> <WG5658> 'Elohim <WG2316>?

When <WG1161> they heard <WG191> <WG5660> these things <WG5023>, they held their peace <WG2270> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> <WG5707> 'Elohim <WG2316>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Then <WG686> hath <WG1325> 'Elohim <WG2316> also <WG2534> to the goyim <WG1484> granted <WG1325> <WG5656> repentance <WG3341> unto <WG1519> life <WG2222>.

Now <WG3767> <WG3303> they which were scattered abroad <WG1289> <WG5651> upon <WG575> the persecution <WG2347> that arose <WG1096> <WG5637> about <WG1909> Stephen <WG4736> travelled <WG1330> <WG5627> as far as <WG2193> Phenice <WG5403>, and <WG2532> Cyprus <WG2954>, and <WG2532> Antioch <WG490>, preaching <WG2980> <WG5723> the word <WG3056> to none <WG3367> but <WG1508> unto the Jews <WG2453> only <WG3440>.

And <WG1161> some <WG5100> of <WG1537> them <WG846> were <WG2258> <WG5713> men <WG435> of Cyprus <WG2953> and <WG2532> Cyrene <WG2956>, which <WG3748>, when they were come <WG1525> <WG5631> to <WG1519> Antioch <WG490>, spake <WG2980> <WG5707> unto <WG4314> the Grecians <WG1675>, preaching <WG2097> <WG5734> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

And <WG2532> the hand <WG5495> of the YY <WG2962> was <WG2258> <WG5713> with <WG3326> them <WG846>: and <WG5037> a great <WG4183> number <WG706> believed <WG4100> <WG5660>, and turned <WG1994> <WG5656> unto <WG1909> the YY <WG2962>.

Then <WG1161> tidings <WG3056> of <WG4012> these things <WG846> came <WG191> <WG5681> unto <WG1519> the ears <WG3775> of the Congregation <WG1577> which <WG3588> was in <WG1722> Yerushalayim <WG2414>: and <WG2532> they sent forth <WG1821> <WG5656> Bar-Nabba <WG921>, that he should go <WG1330> <WG5629> as far as <WG2193> Antioch <WG490>.

Who <WG3739>, when he came <WG3854> <WG5637>, and <WG2532> had seen <WG1492> <WG5631> the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, was glad <WG5463> <WG5644>, and <WG2532> exhorted <WG3870> <WG5707> them all <WG3956>, that with purpose <WG4286> of heart <WG2588> they would cleave unto <WG4357> <WG5721> the YY <WG2962>.

For <WG3754> he was <WG2258> <WG5713> a good <WG18> man <WG435>, and <WG2532> full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> and <WG2532> of faith <WG4102>: and <WG2532> much <WG2425> people <WG3793> was added <WG4369> <WG5681> unto the YY <WG2962>.
Then <WG1161> departed <WG1831> <WG5627> Bar-Nabba <WG921> to <WG1519> Tarsus <WG5019>, for to seek <WG327> <WG5658> Saul <WG4569>:

And <WG2532> when he had found <WG2147> <WG5631> him <WG846>, he brought <WG71> <WG5627> him <WG846> unto <WG1519> Antioch <WG490>. And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that a whole <WG3650> year <WG1763> they <WG846> assembled themselves <WG4863> <WG5683> with <WG1722> the Congregation <WG1577>, and <WG2532> taught <WG1321> <WG5658> much <WG2425> people <WG3793>. And <WG1161> in <WG1722> these <WG5025> days <WG2250> came <WG2718> <WG5627> prophets <WG4396> from <WG575> Yerushalayim <WG2414> unto <WG1519> Antioch <WG490>.

Which <WG3739> also <WG2532> they did <WG4160> <WG5656>, and sent it <WG649> <WG5660> to <WG4314> the elders <WG4245> by <WG1223> the hands <WG5495> of Bar-Nabba <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569>.
